summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling and legal strategy regarding a subpoena response from the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner (BSF) in relation to the Epstein case. It mentions coordination with a colleague named Bekah and a legal discussion with Karl.

persons.name: Bekah
persons.context: Mentioned as having been called by the email author to provide updates on scheduling and legal approach regarding the BSF files. She is coordinating on a filing deadline.

persons.name: Karl
persons.context: The email author spoke to Karl about legal questions that were previously flagged in an email. The discussion pertains to the substantive review of files related to the case.

connections.description: Both are colleagues of the email author, involved in the legal strategy and review of materials related to the subpoena response from BSF.

events.title: Legal Strategy Call Scheduled
events.description: The email author proposes a call for the evening to discuss legal questions and the substantive review of files received from the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner (BSF).

events.title: Filing Deadline for BSF Letter
events.description: A letter regarding the BSF files needs to be filed by 5 p.m. Bekah indicated she could review it if received by noon.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email between prosecutors in the Southern District of New York discussing the Epstein case.
It references a subpoena response and production of materials from the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner (BSF).
Prosecutors are coordinating on a legal strategy and a filing deadline related to the BSF files.
The email shows active legal work and case management occurring in April 2021.
